CONVERSATION GROUP: BK I know Indra wants to find out who killed her father, but she should leave it to the authorities. Offering a reward will only complicate matters.
BK Have you heard about the murder? Indra is offering a large reward for anyone that can bring her justice.
BK Overheard some townspeople say you were looking for help.
If there's a reward involved, count me in.

Two days ago, I found my father, Bertrand, in this very room with his throat slit. He was a well-known trader, and some of his goods were stolen.
BK fact: 'throat slit'

BK she seemed rather rude here.
If you're not here to help, do not waste my time any longer.
No, I want to help. Tell me what happened.

BK too much personality
That's horrible!
BK It gets worse. My fiance, Edwin, has not been seen since that night. The town watch assumes he killed my father and made off with the loot, but Edwin would never do that!
BK Why are you so sure he's innocent?
I know it sounds naive, but I trust him wholeheartedly. He doesn't have the heart, or honestly the ambition, for that sort of thing.

BK - I reshuffled the order of player responses and removed a dialog node
BK And I am afraid that whoever killed my father may have taken him, or worse!
BK What can you tell me about Bertrand?
What kinds of goods were taken from the crime scene?

BK He worked his way up by building a business that traded in-demand bulk materials such as lumber and iron. In the past few years, though, he began moving into specialty goods that were more difficult to acquire, like rare herbs used in potions or minerals with alchemic properties.
BK He knew how to make his profit, but everything he did was legal. Some people may not have liked it, but I don't believe anyone killed him over his business ethics.

BK That's the puzzling thing, and what really bothers me. Several valuables were taken from his most recent shipment, but many others were left untouched. I don't understand why a thief would leave anything behind after going so far as to kill a man....

BK It may just be a coincidence, but among the stolen goods all contained various bits of jewelry. It's not terribly valuable, but maybe that makes it easier to sell on the street. I don't know if that helps, but that's all I can think of.

BK - Edited this further. the players gets a KEY and his pick of treasure.
BK I'm upset, and my father left me a substantial inheritance. So, if a sense of justice isn't enough to motivate you, know that you will be fairly compensated. A choice of a magic item from my father's collection or a sum of gold, if that is more to your liking.
You're back. Can I help you with anything?
BK Edwin already told me everything. You've brought my love back to me and delivered justice to that cult.
Happy to be able to help.
Yes, and as promised, here is your reward. The chest in the back has some of my father's unsold items. Here's the key, they're all yours. Thank you for everything.

BK I am sorry for your loss, but we did take care of those responsible.
BK there was a broken link here.
It was a demon cult, but they are no more. I believe you owe us something.
Yes, thank you. Here is your reward. The chest in the back has some of my father's unsold items. Here's the key, they're all yours. Now please leave me to grieve.

BK this may be overkill to fix bug https://jira.n-space.com:8101/browse/HOTU-11749 but I thought it would make the "Do you know Betrand" dialog that pops up in all the NPCs more natural if Indra suggests investigating them.
Bk Did you ever deal with Bertrand?
Oooooh, I've tried just about everything there is. And let me tell you, I only sell the highest quality stuff here.
BK Hopefully, they find Edwin soon. But I bet he's skipped town by now.
BK How did you know exactly what was stolen?
Who? And why? If it was a robbery, they already got away with it. Take the coin and run.
BK Oh, um... did I say that? I must have overheard it somewhere.
It must have been a coincidence that you were asking about jewels in the alchemy shop earlier.

BK added reference as librarian, because her name is only mentioned once in dialog. Also dropped the Trusting Her bit because it could be read that she was involved in the plot. But what was meant is that he should have not left any witnesses. Which I don't think we need to get into.
BK Don't play dumb. Orina told me all about it. Trusting her was not a good idea.
I saw you in there myself. I guess you didn't notice me. So, you're into demons? <Lie.>
[SLEIGHT OF HAND] Pour the alchemist's gift on the plants.

BK trying to restructure this to reflect the state of "vine coverage". Please let me know if I broke anything. Apologies in advance.
[A wooden hatch appears to lead to a basement. Thick green vines are interwoven around its handles and appear to lead inside the handles.]
[The hatch opens, and you can now travel below.]
[The vines prevent you from opening the hatch. Perhaps you should try to remove them.]
[You pour a single drop of the Icewind Mixture onto the vines. Almost immediately, a chilling wave passes through the vines, freezing them immediately.]
BK I modified this to be a proper strength check here
WHY ISN'T THIS WORKING??? I DON'T...
BK Hey! This area is closed to the public! Sherm! Sherm!!
BK Are you kidding me? Gah! Some days, I swear! What else could go wrong!
BK Sounds like you're having a bit of trouble with your little ritual.
BK Shut up! It's only a minor setback! And you! you're as good as dead!
BK I'm sure my celebration would seem more exuberant if I could move. He at least got that part of the ritual correct.
This may surprise you, but I'm not exactly an expert on the subject of demonic rituals. Maybe if you disrupt the ritual somehow?
BK If I had to wager a guess, perhaps it's this amulet I'm wearing. Maybe it actually has protective elements! Wouldn't that be something?

Bertrand and I were taking inventory of his recent acquisitions, which included that weird relic. Out of nowhere a bunch of cultists burst into the house, ran him through, and threw a sack over my head.
I'll see what I can do to free you.
BK I blacked out at some point, and when I came to, I was here and unable to move. It's been some time, and I would appreciate being able to relieve myself once again, so please hurry.
BK I have to head back right now! Indra must be worried sick! Please come see us as soon as possible!

CONVERSATION GROUP.Name: ambient fake convo to kill particle effect

CONVERSATION GROUP: That would be me. I guess we're going to fight now.
Umm... it was that guy. I took care of him for you.
I will enjoy feasting on your flesh!
BK It matters not. I will devour you all the same!
